html:
2.25.20  4:28 pm   do you exist.

      if so, why?
2.25.20  4:12 pm   how do you record drums for your songs? they don't sound like midi and DEFINITELY don't sound like air drums
2.25.20  4:08 pm   how soon do you think until you start instagram hints

2.25.20  4:02 pm   i have a new job that i really enjoy, but sometimes i get really bored. it's frowned upon to look at my phone or even stand in one spot for too long. what do you recommend i do to keep my brain occupied?

      i can sometimes get away with listening to music but sometimes i need to hear stuff so i can't

2.25.20  4:01 pm   oh god i really wanna drop out of school and i can do so if i want to, but i'm not sure if i should take that step yet

it's just ridiculous at this point. i keep telling myself to study but i just end up doing nothing. when i get bad grades i start bitching about it as if i don't know the reason as to why i'm such a bad student. i guess i've just lost all of my motivation to be a good student with healthy studying habits. might as well drop out since i can't stop procrastinating all the time.

i mean, why should i keep up with school anymore? i don't have any future plans or anything. plus i'm extremely lazy so i'm screwed.


should i just say "fuck it" and drop out, or should i somehow manage my way out of this stupid loop? help!!
2.25.20  3:53 pm   give me advice on life
2.25.20  3:52 pm   are you learning 3D modeling?
2.25.20  2:46 pm   on a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate the 1 to 10 scale?
2.25.20  2:41 pm   have you ever eaten a wind dried puffin?
2.25.20  2:40 pm   what program do u use to make ur movies
2.25.20  2:28 pm   favorite mythological creature?
2.25.20  2:22 pm   Do you hate Irish people
2.25.20  2:07 pm   how do i figure out the chords in a song. i can't ever do it correctly it's so confusing

2.25.20  2:01 pm   how can i become a genius like you?
2.25.20  1:39 pm   Is the world going to change?

2.25.20  12:58 pm   Can you give me some advice on how to get better at singing?

      And did you ever use autotune,

      and if you did, in which songs?
2.25.20  12:55 pm   Can we talk about the paintings that can often be seen in your reality videos? Dod you paint them yourself?
2.25.20  12:51 pm   What is true?
2.25.20  12:51 pm   How many pumpkins?
2.25.20  12:29 pm   is it true that you killed a capital letter once?
2.25.20  12:28 pm   I'm really excited about what's coming next with the countdown timer getting closer to 0 and this period of you learning new shit

2.25.20  11:46 am   have you written essays before?

      if yes, i'd like to see a sample one from you

this

Saturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:58 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:58 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:58 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:58 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:58 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:19:59 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:20:00 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:20:00 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:20:00 AMSaturday, August 13, 2005 2:20:00 AM

 

 

 

blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

these are my existentialist notes for the world.    

 

 

 

for the world?   do you really intend to be talking to the world?

 

 

 

i dunno.

 

 

but if i am,  hi world.

 

 

 

 

(hi,  how you doing)

 

 

 

 

(why did you wish to speak to me)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

.....................u m m m m m m m m   (stutters nervously)

 

 

 

i  d on't know

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

blah blah blah.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

etc

 

 

 

 

 

 

blah blah blah 

 

 

 

etc

 

 

 

 

blah blah blah etc, i am very nervous,   etc

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BLAH BLAH BLAH I AM A HORSEFISH!            no you are not a horsefish,  there is nothing that is a horse fish

 

 

 

 

ATTENTION!       YOUR WORLD IS TERRIFIC AND ABSOLUTELY MAGNAMIOUSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS     i hope you agree yet i don't like it

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ok ok ok 

 

 

so i'm not actually talking to the world

 

 

 

 

my name is bill 

 

 

 

 i'm inside a house

 

 

 

 

etc

 

 

 

but what do i want to do 

 

 

 

 

it's almost like i want to make a giant scarf.

 

 

 

 

 

 

what if i actually made a giant scarf and spread it over this entire driveway.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

and then i'd say 'what can i do for less production cost'

2.25.20  1:03 am   Have you ever destroyed something your younger self made because you thought it was lame?

      When i was a teenager i destroyed all of my many many childhood stories, diaries and artworks because i was embarrassed by how stupid i thought they were. It's a very big regret of mine.
2.25.20  12:43 am   why do you think people like to hate on pop music?
2.25.20  12:43 am   what's your approach to film scoring versus songwriting? seems much more anything-goes to me
2.24.20  11:03 pm   hey bill. i got a new computer and i was wondering if you could tell me how to use it

2.24.20  10:54 pm   hey it's the person who figured out land of hope and glory on the keyboard, guess what i just figured out the voc melody AND instrumental hook of spotlight by marshmello and lil peep. i have to go significantly slower than the original song, like 60bpm, but i can do it with the hook in my left hand and sung melody in my right hand and i'm SURE it's correct. like damn sure, so secure beyond a shadow of a doubt, and i know it cuz my ears told me it. this is so much fucking fun. the better i get at this the more grateful i am for you and the prouder i get of myself. like fuck, I even figured out how to set the programmable metronome built into my keyboard. anyway do you have any suggestions on what i should try next before i abandon all vestiges of sensibility and go gloriously batshit crazy

2.24.20  10:53 pm   Please have your own podcast,

      I'll buy you bread

2.24.20  10:40 pm   does your creative process of letting ideas accumulate and then revisiting them later function as a defense mechanism against the fear of not having any ideas?

      if so, I'm interested. if not, I'm interested
2.24.20  9:49 pm   how to stop the panic
2.24.20  9:47 pm   wanna play scrabble?
